availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas McKinster (Lawrence County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Delila McKinster. Father of Elizabeth McKinster, Sarah Ann McKinster, Harrison W. Mckinster, Louisa McKinster, Louisiana McKinster. Married to Jane McKinster. Father of Farrish McKinster, Joseph McKinster, and Martin McKinster. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1850 and 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from 1861 to 1865. Served in the 68th Regiment of Kentucky Militia as colonel from May 21, 1864 to June 22, 1864.

ab.bibl:

Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 889.
